Device: Fusion-io ioDrive Octal (single PCI Express card)
OCZ 2x SuperScale Z-Drive R4 PCI-Express SSD

IOPS: Up to 1,200,000 IOPS SPC-1 IOPS with the K2-D (DRAM)
1,261,145 SPECsfs2008 nfsv3 IOPs using disks with virtual storage tiering.
Notes: SPECsfs2008 is the latest version of the Standard Performance Evaluation Corporation benchmark suite measuring file server throughput and response time, providing a standardized method for comparing performance across different vendor platforms. http://www.spec.org/sfs2008/
